author: Mani Singh
comment: Hi I got this watch face because in my opinion it's the most coolest looking one. Would rate it 5 but problem I have is that the 9 and 6 and 7 look strange. Is it possible to fix that please?
title: Message to developer

author: Jacob Anderson
comment: It would be great if it didn't show up in my phones app drawer. And the time gets covered by notification cards, cancelling. the convenience of smart watch.  Love it to pieces otherwise.
title: Just a few touch ups and it could one of the most popular faces ever

author: Nick Reyes
comment: Finally fixed it no thanks to the developer
title: Works now

author: trey tugwell
comment: Won't show up in my watch faces

author: Iain Rogers
comment: The design is very nice and ambient mode works a treat, however the card previews are too large and block the time. It needs an option to use the smaller card previews, otherwise it's a bit useless. I know the dev is responsive, so I hope they take this on board. EDIT: The lack of response from developer has forced me to change my review. Watch face is useless if cards cover the time.
title: Looks nice, however...

author: Nate Clements
comment: Great watch face and great developer. Helped me get it working correctly for my Asus Zenwatch! It would be nice to have the notifications be short cards instead of taking up a good chunk of the screen (e.g. music player when listening to music on my phone interferes with the time). But still great watch face!
title: Great!

author: Skippy skefnietof
comment: Nice watchface. I have a lg g watch and I have no benefit from a black and white dimmed screen. Could you please provide a setting toggle to make dimmed mode full color? I want a colorful display all the time.
title: Nice

author: Andrew Edwards
comment: Zero features other than a simple background to the clock. Don't waste your money.
title: Lacking

comment: Just wish it had date, missed calls, messages, steps, weather, battery meter, calories burned. It only shows time :-(
title: Sticker Bomb Watchface

author: Mohaned Bakr
comment: I bought this and waited a couple of days for it to show up on my watch but it never did, please respond because the watch face looks dope and I'd appreciate a reply
title: Not showing on gear s2

author: SKaTeLEE GAmeR
comment: Looks wonderful on my LG G watch! Please add more sticker bomb backgrounds! ☺
title: Very cool!

author: Randy Hall
comment: Never got a response. Attempted refund as soon as I realized how big the cards were.
title: Asked for a refund

author: Brett Palmer
comment: Looks great. Works nicely on my moto 360 (2nd gen)
title: Niiiiice

author: Touchwood Tumbleweed
comment: Gorgeous and artistic. The colors truly pop!

author: Justin Cha
comment: Card previews block half of the time. It would look nice if it moved up when a card preview is shown. FORM is one watchface I know that does this.
title: Looks great but card previews block the time.

author: Michael Gittins
comment: Awesome watch face. I had an issue and emailed the designer and it was fixed within 24 hours. My watch just got that little bit cooler! Thank you
title: Great watch face, Great support

author: David shearing
comment: Does work on the Moto 360 got it to show after a reboot but it just kept crashing.
